name: hanoa-integrated
description: Hanoa 통합 플랫폼 - 백엔드 서버 + Flutter 데스크톱 앱

scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && flutter pub get
scripts.clean: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../frontend && flutter clean
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && flutter test"

author: Hanoa Team
